page.title: 12Industry and Transport
page.content: In our survey area there is one small industrial estate called Mushroom Farm. It is called mushroom farm not because people used to grow mushrooms there, but because the farm grows outwards like a mushroom does. These firms are on the estate: garage which specialises in heavy vehicle repairs engineering factory which makes plastic washers, screws and adjusters a firm which makes wooden pallets a fuel oil delivery business a building contractor a car repairers Our survey area also contains another small engineering firm and a coach depot.
